name: 英文（三）：教育英文
restrict: ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】
description:
藉由主題式課程，加深學生對該領域實務趨勢認識、議題簡報、實務案例討論與批判分析。
強化學生該領域之實務/任務型英語口語溝通、簡報、寫作表達能力。
goals: 提升英語組織與跨文化溝通表達能力
培養實務案例批判及分析能力
拓展國際視野及移動力
促進實務領域的協作能力
syllabus:
The main goal of this course is to enhance non-English majors’ English abilities to understand and discuss educational issues through watching education-based films. In each film, students will learn English expressions and talk about the educational issues highlighted in the films. To ensure students’ learning, two projects will be conducted. While the mid-term project will engage students in illustrating educational issues through comics, the final project will engage students in talking about educational issues through mini-film production. In this way, students are expected to learn education-related English and broaden their knowledge and views about education at the same time.

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】
